item.title: Google CTF 2023: MHK2
item.description: MHK2 is one of the challenges I coauthored for Google CTF 2023 and there were 18 teams solving this challenge during the contest time. Challenge Summary I hid your flag using one of Murakami’s knapsacks Attachments: MHK2.sage, output.txt This challenge implements the knapsack cryptosystem from Y. Murakami, S. Hamasho and M. Kasahara’s paper “A knapsack public-key cryptosystem using two random sequences”. Below summarizes how a keypair is generated and how a bit is being encrypted:
